ID: C1Y4ZQ8_00
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Tracey Griffin <Tracey.Griffin@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-22 18:54
Subject: Re: Quick Meeting Request
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Tracey,

Thanks for forwarding the below details.

Ace Galleghar is very good and has a highly competent team and we initially placed the D&O policy with them 2 years back. 

I already have solid contacts from the management team of Ace Galleghar. However, they (Ace) have a VP who is ex-NASCO with a not so clean break to put it mildly. So, I usually refrain from approaching them not to antagonize our existing partner. I just used them for one year to make sure we get a competitive offer.

The Ace team is very good and highly competent and my impression of them was highly positive. However, it is not an issue, there are a lot of highly competent brokers that are still available and interested to compete for the Chalhoub Insurance portfolio so the competitive pressure is always there.

Wish you a pleasant and lovely evening.

Best Regards,
Hagop

The Ace team is very good and highly competent and my impression of them was highly positive. Best Regards,
Hagop

From: Christian Nawfal <cnawfal@ace-gallagher.com>
Sent: 09 April 2025 02:00 PM
To: tracey.griffin@chalhoub.com
Subject: Quick Meeting Request

 

Hello Tracey,

 

Hope you’re doing well.

 

I’d love the opportunity to briefly connect and learn more about your insurance needs. Would you please refer me to the person who handles that department?

Hello Tracey,

 

Hope you’re doing well.

 

I’d love the opportunity to briefly connect and learn more about your insurance needs. Would you please refer me to the person who handles that department?

 

I work for ACE Gallagher, a pioneer in the insurance industry throughout the GCC. We offer comprehensive, tailor-made insurance and reinsurance broking solutions across all industries and business segments.

 

We work with top tier companies such as Emirates NBD, Deloitte, American Express, MSC Cruises and ENOC, just to name a few.

 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

 

Best regards,

 

Christian Nawfal
Senior Account Executive
